name: Neuro Shells
pages: Blast radius: 5.0$(br)Base damage: 4.0$(br2)$(#0590fa)$(l)Neuro$() shells' specialty is weakening target attack strength. Applies the Neuro-Suppressed potion effect in a very small area.

pages.title: Neuro-Suppressed
pages.text: Neuro grenades impart the Neuro-Suppressed III effect on targets. All damage sources traceable back to that target are reduced by $(l)99.99%$().
